name: Yet Another Exhausted Day
description:
Yet another exhausted day for our protagonist.
Shortly after he had gone to sleep there was a knock on the door...

  • Move & Turn: WAD
  • Please turn up volume or use a headphone

Thanks for all the kind words and videos about this game. My studio decided to make this prototype a full game. Check out the brand new demo H...E...R...E...z...zz...zzz
